name: HL7FHIRNewZealandBaseImplementationGuide
title: HL7® FHIR® New Zealand Base Implementation Guide

resource.name: NZ Address datatype
resource.description: Adds building name, suburb, domicile code and geocode to the Address datatype

resource.name: NZ Location
resource.description: NZ base Location profile. Adds slicing for HPI Facility code and uses nzAddress

resource.name: NZ Organization
resource.description: base NZ Organization profile. Slices on identifier for HPI and uses nzAddress

resource.name: NZ Patient
resource.description: The base Patient resource in NZ. Slices on identifer for NHI numbers (current & old), uses nzAddress and adds sme commonly used extensions

resource.name: NZ Practitioner
resource.description: The New Zealand base practitioner. Slices on identifier for CPN, makes name mandatory and uses NZ address.

resource.name: BirthPlace
resource.description: The country where the person was born

resource.name: BuildingName
resource.description: Used on an adddress datatype when a building name is needed

resource.name: Citizenship
resource.description: New Zealand citizenship

resource.name: Dhb
resource.description: The District Health Board the patient resides in. It is derived from the patient's primary residential address (not updated directly).

resource.name: DomicileCode
resource.description: The domicile code. Derived from the address

resource.name: EdiAddress
resource.description: Represents the HealthLink EDI number.

resource.name: Informationsource
resource.description: The source of the information. Used paricularly in the NHI. Note this not the person but rather than it came from a passport for example

resource.name: NzEthnicity
resource.description: The ethnicity of the patient. Uses level 4 codes (most detailed).

resource.name: NzGeocode
resource.description: The new zealand geocode. This uses a different datum from that defined in the spec for the geocode, so is an extension rather than using the element in the spec. see discussion at https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/geocode.20extension

resource.name: Patient_iwi
resource.description: Details related to maori ancestry

resource.name: SexAtBirth
resource.description: The persons sex when born. Is considered to be immutable

resource.name: Suburb
resource.description: The suburb of the address. This is not the same as 'district' or 'state.

resource.name: Patient citizenship status
resource.description: Status of citizenship in NZ

resource.name: dhb
resource.description: dhb

resource.name: domicileCode
resource.description: domicileCode

resource.name: Patient ethnicity
resource.description: Level 4 ethnicity codes

resource.name: infosource
resource.description: infosource

resource.name: Iwi
resource.description: New Zealand iwi codes

resource.name: Patient citizenship status
resource.description: Status of citizenship in NZ

resource.name: District Health Board Code
resource.description: District Health Board Code

resource.description: domicileCode

resource.description: Level 4 ethnicity codes

resource.name: infosource
resource.description: infosource

resource.name: Iwi
resource.description: New Zealand iwi codes

resource.name: HPI facility number
resource.description: The HPI identifier for an organization (eg a DHB)

resource.name: HPI organization number
resource.description: The HPI identifier for an organization (eg a DHB)

resource.name: HPI person number
resource.description: The HPI identifier for an individual (eg a clinician)

resource.name: NHI number
resource.description: Represents the identifier used by the NHI

resource.name: base1
resource.description: This is the base Patient profile
Chiropractic Board Register number.
resource.name: HPIChirprcactic

resource.description: HPI Provider identifier system. Also known as the HPI_CPN (Common Person Number)
resource.name: HPIPerson

resource.name: HPIDental

resource.description: Dietitians Board Register Number .
resource.name: HPIDiet

resource.description: The New Zealand HPI Facility identifier system.
resource.name: HPIFacility

resource.description: Medical Laboratory Science Board Register Number .
resource.name: HPIMedLab

resource.name: NzBN

resource.description: Occupational Therapy Board Register Number
resource.name: NZOccupationalTherapy

resource.description: Optometrists & Dispensing Opticians Board Register Number
resource.name: NZOptitian

resource.description: HPI Organization identifier system.
resource.name: HPIOrganization

resource.name: NZOsteo
